title: Sand dunes: An introduction
creator_credit: Anvil Films and Record Group and David Walton
brief_description: Begins by illustrating the formation of a sand dune and goes on to show how plant life becomes established. The animals population is also examined. From the series “Basic Ecology”.
creator_credit_for_label: Anvil Films and Record Group and David Walton
